mapper.sql: TID, TNAME, TJOB, TDEPT, TTITLE, TPERIODICAL, TCNID, TISSNID, TSTARTTIME, TOTHERS, TSCORE, TREMAKS, TSECOND, TTHIRD, TACHNUM, TMEMBERS
mapper.select:
select
from K_THESIS
TNAME like concat(concat('%',#{tname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
and TTITLE like concat(concat('%',#{ttitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
mapper.insert: insert into K_THESIS (TID, TNAME, TJOB, TDEPT, TTITLE, TPERIODICAL, TCNID, TISSNID, TSTARTTIME, TOTHERS, TSCORE, TREMAKS, TSECOND, TTHIRD, TACHNUM, TMEMBERS) values (#{tid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tjob,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tdept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ttitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tperiodical,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tcnid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tissnid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tstarttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tothers,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tscore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tremaks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tsecond,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tthird,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tachnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tmembers,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update K_THESIS
TNAME = #{tname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TJOB = #{tjob,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TDEPT = #{tdept,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TTITLE = #{ttitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TPERIODICAL = #{tperiodical,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TCNID = #{tcnid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TISSNID = #{tissnid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TSTARTTIME = #{tstarttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TOTHERS = #{tothers,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TSCORE = #{tscore,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TREMAKS = #{tremaks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TSECOND = #{tsecond,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TTHIRD = #{tthird,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TACHNUM = #{tachnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TMEMBERS = #{tmembers,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where TID = #{tid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update K_THESIS set TNAME = #{tname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TJOB = #{tjob,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TDEPT = #{tdept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TTITLE = #{ttitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TPERIODICAL = #{tperiodical,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TCNID = #{tcnid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TISSNID = #{tissnid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TSTARTTIME = #{tstarttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TOTHERS = #{tothers,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TSCORE = #{tscore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TREMAKS = #{tremaks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TSECOND = #{tsecond,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TTHIRD = #{tthird,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TACHNUM = #{tachnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TMEMBERS = #{tmembers,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where TID = #{tid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
